name: Brutal Death Metal
description: Emphasizes abrasiveness, chunky rhythmic atonal riffs, and low guttural vocals.

children.name: Slam Death Metal
children.description: Focuses on slow or midtempo (as well as breakdown-style) sections built on chromatic, palm-muted riffs - so-called "slams".
